headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Steel Dynamics (STLD) After Its 5-Year 4x Gain?
summary: This article aims to help you decide whether Steel Dynamics still looks attractively priced after a strong run, or whether the most obvious value opportunity may already have passed. The stock last closed at US$193.39, with returns of 0.9% over 7 days, 6.7% over 30 days, 9.8% year to date, 50.1% over 1 year, 70.6% over 3 years, and a substantial gain of roughly 4x over 5 years. Recent coverage of Steel Dynamics has focused on its position as a major US steel producer and how investors are...
